column4: just did a fresh install of 7.04 and my internet is not working or being recognised. need help please
what's your nic make and model?
SiS Unknown device 0671 is what lspci gives me
can you dl a live 7.10 cd?
try it with the live cd
7.10 has same effect
livecd has no internet either
hmms, than it's a major problem for you
I do have a NIC card that works in my older pc . think I can swap them out without major issues on the driver side of things?
that would be a wise choice until a driver is created for your card
guess that is what I will do then. thank you
never mind.
never mind?
lspci now lists Realtek Semiconductor Co. RTL-8029 (AS) but still no internet
ok, can you check /etc/udev/rules.d/70-persistent-net.rules if you can see your nic in there?
no such directory
nice one... what's your distro?
can you check ifconfig?
can you see any nics configured such as eth0 eth1?
eth0
it seems to work then, can you assign an ip to it from your router range by ifconfig eth0 192.168.x.x and ping your router?
network unreachable but I may have the gateway wrong
hmms, it's strange not to have an internet connection with a realtek chipset nic
are you connected to a router or is it just two pcs interconnected?
